summary: Another in my line of Crests Mod
descriptionHtml:
McIlmoyle Family Crest:

as im sure most of you have noticed, ive been making alot of \'Crests Mods\' recently due to a MASSIVE load of requests coming in (thats not a complaint by the way, keep \'em coming!).

well this was one requested by LogikBomb to put the McIlmoyle Family Crest onto the Ebony Armor. and i have to say, i LOVE this retexture myself and will deffinately use it in my game just because the shield looks AWESOME! this is Male only at the moment, i will add Female in a 1.1

anyway... hope you like it, if you do then endorse it, if not, then comment with your feed-back so i can continue to improve this mod and my general texturing skills.

this and all my other mods are always available to use in your own provided you ask my permission first and send me a link to the finished product when/if you release it, and as always, im open to requests for the Crests Mod and any other re-textures you might like.

Callaghan04
author: Callaghan04
